tweets.text: Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

What do you do when you know your next door neighbour does this? #flytippers  #PeopleMakeGlasgow #litter  our flats share wheelies too which they refuse to separate their waste into. Their excuse, it all gets taken away. üòí @GlasgowCC @EnvAgency wht can ya do wi nghbrs like that? https://t.co/dH9iz1AqS9

Great work & dedication by our MP @AaronBell4NUL out now verifying odours. When I was out at tea time the odour was building up in the Silverdale area to level 4. The east side of town is suffering tonight. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids why are we having to do your job for you? https://t.co/jSzeFkbYvD

This old ash by the R. Len was deliberately torched & badly damaged. It is a haven for wildlife, but impedes a favoured (unauthorised) angling swim. The riverbank (& channel) in the LNR is being systematically cleared of all vegetation and deadwood to create new swims.@EnvAgency https://t.co/l8WxHrPxXf
#Women into leadership virtual event 2021 ,inspiring and motivational .Exceptional speakers ,thank you to the team for organising .@EnvAgencySE @wifo_ea @WomenInFCERM
Many of the long duration sewage spills are not legal - just not prosecuted by the @EnvAgency so pollution remains very profitable. https://t.co/YWJqwLgYs2

tweets.text: We recognise concerns about odour around #WalleysQuarry landfill & how difficult this is for local people. We‚Äôve had officers out today to check odour & will continue to do so. We‚Äôre aware of increased wait times on our hotline so please remember you can email us too. https://t.co/Oj3QeLcCfq

@EnvAgencyAnglia Do you not have a response team that attends such calls for help from this morning? We have several pairs of swans on here not to mention the other birds and aquatic life. How long will they be left to suffer the effects?

@SimonTagg @mca_debbie @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @KeeleUniversity @StaffsFire @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL If 1 surgeon loses a patient and directly blames noxious fumes/gases from the landfill then they'll be looking at corporate manslaughter?

A head teacher of a local school is saying this @ClareDinnisEA & @EnvAgencyMids and in the last few days @KeeleUniversity @StaffsFire @NewsNBC have joined residents, our MP @AaronBell4NUL and others asking for real action not ‚Äòminor‚Äô action. You have the power. #sortitout https://t.co/83B6vXgBZp

urls.title: Similipal forest fire: It is time to act
urls.description: Forest fires can be controlled in the first few hours; it is important to engage local communities in the first line of action

tweets.text:
The fire that ravaged some areas of the #Similipal forest is a symptom of the deeper malaise that affects this biosphere reserve. The rot extends deeper since there is little political commitment to save the forest, writes @biswajitmohanty.
https://t.co/YfUwRnytyu

urls.title: Reduce the Environmental Impact of Oil
urls.description: The Oil Care Campaign is a joint initiative to provide advice - helping you look after, recycle and reduce the environmental risk of oil

tweets.text:
Any oil leak, no matter how small, can be devastating for aquatic wildlife, birds and fish.

After the recent cold weather now is a good time to check your domestic oil tank for weakened joints and damaged underground pipes.

For more information: https://t.co/UF6jGHz65H https://t.co/Z9RY2UySjj
